base.name: Dragon Blast
base.description: Use to make two attacks against an adjacent foe with a sword and powerful magic beam.

unitTypeModifers.effect: Adds 20% of Str to sword attack.
Adds 20% of Mag to beam attack.

link.description: Use to make a sword attack from the unit and engage partner followed by a magic beam attack against an adjacent foe.

engageWeapons.name: Lyrátion
engageWeapons.description: Sword of Emblem Alear. If user defeats foe in player phase, fills adjacent allies’ engage meters by 1.

engageWeapons.name: Dragon’s Fist
engageWeapons.description: Magical attack wielded by Emblem Alear. If user initiates combat, attacks twice. (Uses Mag.)

engageWeapons.name: Oligoludia
engageWeapons.description: Sword wielded by Emblem Alear. Effective: Corrupted.

base.name: Lodestar Rush
base.description: Use to launch 7 consecutive sword attacks at 30% damage. Adjacent foe only.

engageWeapons.name: Rapier
engageWeapons.description: Avo+20, Sword wielded by Emblem Marth. Effective: Cavalry, Armored.

engageWeapons.name: Mercurius
engageWeapons.description: Sword wielded by Emblem Marth. Doubles user’s earned experience.

engageWeapons.name: Falchion
engageWeapons.description: Sacred sword wielded by Emblem Marth. Effective: Dragon.

base.name: Override
base.description: Use to attack and move through a line of adjacent foes. Sword/lance only.

engageWeapons.name: Tyrfing
engageWeapons.description: Sword wielded by Emblem Sigurd. Grants Res+5.

base.name: Warp Ragnarok
base.description: Use to warp up to 10 spaces and make a powerful magic attack.

engageWeapons.name: Seraphim
engageWeapons.description: Holy tome wielded by Emblem Celica. Effective: Corrupted.

engageWeapons.name: Ragnarok
engageWeapons.description: Mighty fire tome wielded by Emblem Celica.

base.name: Great Sacrifice
base.description: Use to restore full HP to all allies, even those not under the player’s control. After use, unit’s HP=1.

unitTypeModifers.effect: Grants Def+1 to all healed during their next combat.

engageWeapons.name: Shine
engageWeapons.description: Light tome wielded by Emblem Micaiah. Illuminates a 5-space radius (shrinks one space per turn).

engageWeapons.name: Nosferatu
engageWeapons.description: Light tome wielded by Emblem Micaiah. User recovers HP equal to 50% of damage dealt.

engageWeapons.name: Thani
engageWeapons.description: Mighty light tome wielded by Emblem Micaiah. Effective: Cavalry, Armored.

base.name: Blazing Lion
base.description: Use to attack adjacent foe and an area 3 spaces wide. Target area and the 2 rows beyond it are set on fire. Sword only.

engageWeapons.name: Lancereaver
engageWeapons.description: Unusual sword wielded by Emblem Roy. Grants advantage vs. lances but disadvantage vs. axes.

engageWeapons.name: Binding Blade
engageWeapons.description: Famous sword wielded by Emblem Roy. Grants Def/Res+5. Can strike close or at range.

base.name: Quadruple Hit
base.description: Use to attack once each with sword, lance, axe, and bow.

engageWeapons.name: Master Lance
engageWeapons.description: Lance wielded by Emblem Leif. If user initiates combat, attacks twice. Can strike close or at range.

engageWeapons.name: Light Brand
engageWeapons.description: Magical sword wielded by Emblem Leif. Grants Lck+10. Can strike close or at range.

base.name: All For One
base.description: Use to make a sword attack against an adjacent foe. All allies within 2 spaces chain attack.

unitTypeModifers.effect: Ally chain attacks are guaranteed to hit.

engageWeapons.name: Noble Rapier
engageWeapons.description: Sword wielded by Emblem Lucina. Effective: Cavalry, Armored.

engageWeapons.name: Parthia
engageWeapons.description: Bow wielded by Emblem Lucina. Doubles user’s earned experience. Grants Res+5. Effective: Flying.

engageWeapons.name: Parallel Falchion
engageWeapons.description: Sacred sword wielded by Emblem Lucina. Effective: Dragon.

base.name: Astra Storm
base.description: Use to launch 5 bow attacks at 30% damage, up to range 10.

engageWeapons.name: Mani Katti
engageWeapons.description: Divine sword wielded by Emblem Lyn. Effective: Cavalry, Armored.

engageWeapons.name: Mulagir
engageWeapons.description: Mighty bow wielded by Emblem Lyn. Grants Spd+5. Effective: Flying, Dragon.

base.name: Great Aether
base.description: Use to grant Def/Res+5, but unit can’t counter for 1 turn. Next turn, attack a 2-space area, heal HP=30% of damage dealt. Sword/axe only.

engageWeapons.name: Urvan
engageWeapons.description: Heirloom axe wielded by Emblem Ike. Grants Res+3.

engageWeapons.name: Ragnell
engageWeapons.description: Sacred sword wielded by Emblem Ike. Grants Def+5. Can strike close or at range.

base.name: Goddess Dance
base.description: Use to grant another action to all adjacent allies.

unitTypeModifers.effect: Grants +3 to all targets’ basic stats for 1 turn.
Grants Str+4 to targets for 1 turn.
Grants Dex+10 to targets for 1 turn.
Grants Spd+5 to targets for 1 turn.
Grants Def+5 to targets for 1 turn.
Grants Res+5 to targets for 1 turn.
Grants Mag+4 to targets for 1 turn.
Grants Lck+10 to targets for 1 turn.

engageWeapons.name: Sword of the Creator
engageWeapons.description: Sword of Emblem Byleth. Raises damage with user’s Mag. Can strike close or at range. Effective: Dragon [+1 damage for every 3 Mag.]

base.name: Torrential Roar
base.description: Use to attack 3 spaces in a line, turning those spaces into water terrain.

engageWeapons.name: Dual Katana
engageWeapons.description: Unusual sword wielded by Emblem Corrin. Grants advantage vs. lances but disadvantage vs. axes.

engageWeapons.name: Wakizashi
engageWeapons.description: Avo-10, Throwing sword wielded by Emblem Corrin. Can only strike at range, not close up.

engageWeapons.name: Yato
engageWeapons.description: Avo+10, Ddg+10, Sacred sword wielded by Emblem Corrin.

base.name: Twin Strike
base.description: Use to make a sword attack followed by a lance attack from Ephraim on adjacent foe. Effective: Corrupted.

engageWeapons.name: Rapier
engageWeapons.description: Avo+20, Sword wielded by Emblem Marth. Effective: Cavalry, Armored.

engageWeapons.name: Wind Sword
engageWeapons.description: Magical sword wielded by Emblem Eirika. Can strike close or at range. Effective: Flying.

engageWeapons.name: Sieglinde
engageWeapons.description: Paired sword wielded by Emblem Eirika. Effective: Corrupted.

base.name: Houses Unite
base.description: Use to attack with Aymr, Areadbhar, and Failnaught at 50% damage.

link.description: Use to attack with Aymr, Areadbhar, and Failnaught at 50% damage. After combat, take another action.

base.name: Divine Blessing
base.description: Use to grant 1 ally a Revival Stone.

link.description: Use to grant 1 ally a Revival Stone. If ally is not synced, fully restore HP. If ally is synced, +3 to engage meter. If ally is engaged, restore engage turns.

base.name: Storm’s Eye
base.description: Grants immunity to break. Foe cannot follow up. Unit follows up. Lasts 1 turn. Sword/axe only.

link.description: Grants immunity to break. Foe cannot follow up. Unit counters before foe’s first attack and follows up. Lasts 1 turn. Sword/axe only.

engageWeapons.name: Wolf Beil
engageWeapons.description: Axe wielded by Emblem Hector. Effective: Cavalry, Armored.

engageWeapons.name: Runesword
engageWeapons.description: Magic sword of Emblem Hector. Can strike close or at range. Restore HP equal to 50% of damage dealt.

engageWeapons.name: Armads
engageWeapons.description: Lightning-charged axe wielded by Emblem Hector. Grants Def+5. Effective: Dragon.

engageWeapons.name: Hliðskjálf
engageWeapons.description: A staff wielded by Emblem Veronica. If user initiates combat, foe cannot counterattack.

engageWeapons.name: Élivágar
engageWeapons.description: Powerful magic wielded by Emblem Veronica. Nullifies basic stat bonuses on target for 1 turn after combat.

base.name: Cataclysm
base.description: Use to attack foes in an area with fire, thunder and wind magic at 40% damage. Wind is effective: Flying.

link.description: Use to attack foes in an area with fire, thunder and wind magic at 40% damage. Wind is effective: Flying.

engageWeapons.name: Bolting
engageWeapons.description: Long-range thunder magic wielded by Emblem Soren. Cannot follow up.

engageWeapons.name: Rexcalibur
engageWeapons.description: Powerful wind magic wielded by Emblem Soren. Effective: Flying.

base.name: Dark Inferno
base.description: Use to deal damage to foes on certain spaces near unit and set those spaces on fire.

link.description: Use to deal damage to foes on certain spaces near unit and set those spaces on fire.

engageWeapons.name: Bolt Axe
engageWeapons.description: Avo-20, Magic axe wielded by Emblem Camilla. Can strike close or at range.

engageWeapons.name: Lightning
engageWeapons.description: Magic wielded by Emblem Camilla. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

engageWeapons.name: Camilla’s Axe
engageWeapons.description: Axe wielded by Emblem Camilla. Grants Res+10 and deals extra damage = foe’s Res-Def.
